DOC.brief_summary: This pilot clinical trial study copper Cu 64-DOTA-B-Fab positron emission tomography ( PET ) /computed tomography ( CT ) image patient ovarian breast cancer . Cancer antigen ( CA ) 6 antigen ( substance ) find surface several type cancer cell cancer ovary breast . Diagnostic procedure , copper Cu 64-DOTA-B-Fab PET/CT , may help identify CA6 positive tumor allow doctor plan good treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Copper Cu 64-DOTA-B-Fab PET/CT Imaging Patients With Ovarian Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine dosimetry 64Cu-DOTA B-Fab ( copper Cu 64-DOTA-B-Fab ) . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate safety 64Cu-DOTA B-Fab single administration . II . To evaluate ability 64Cu-DOTA B-Fab detect CA6-positive ovarian breast cancer lesion . III . To compare PET result immunohistochemistry ( IHC ) analysis excise tumor sample . OUTLINE : Patients receive copper Cu 64-DOTA-B-Fab intravenously ( IV ) follow PET/CT immediately injection , 60 minute , 120 minute , 24 hour . After completion study , patient follow 12 month .
